webpage.para: Several experimental DocBook XML Schemas are available:

listitem.para: The RELAX DocBook Schema is an attempt to express DocBook in the RELAX Schema language.
The Trex DocBook Schema is an attempt to express DocBook in the Trex Schema language.
The XML Schema version of DocBook is an attempt to express DocBook in the W3C XML Schema language.
The Schematron Schema expresses a suite of additional constraints that DocBook documents are expected to satisfy but that cannot be expressed in the other schema languages (including DTDs).
Some of these constraints (exclusions, for example) can be expressed in the SGML version of the DTD, but not in the XML version. Others have previously only been expressed in prose.
